comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The photo looks strangely modern for the 1880s. It was the Burton (not Durton) Bros in Dunedin - "During the 1880s Alfred [Burton] travelled extensively through the South Pacific, photographing scenes of village life in Samoa, Fiji, and Tonga." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burton_Brothers

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] I agree BC, I thought it looked rather modern for the rest of the images, but Burton's travelling dates match the rest of the album, cheers :)
